phdl.parser
Class InstanceDeclarations

java.lang.Object
  phdl.parser.Element
      phdl.parser.Declaration
          phdl.parser.ArrayDeclaration
              phdl.parser.InstanceDeclarations
Direct Known Subclasses:
InstanceDeclaration, SubDesignDeclaration
public abstract class InstanceDeclarations
extends ArrayDeclaration

An abstract class that represents all instance declarations in phdl. In addition to the inherited fields, an instance declaration also has a reference name, binding it to its device or sub design declaration.

Author:
Richard Black and Brad Riching
